title: Premier League team of the week: Star performers from Leicester, Liverpool, Manchester United and more with hat-tricks from Pulisic, Vardy and Perez
text:
Liverpool remained six points clear at the top of the Premier League thanks to a 2-1 comeback win over Tottenham on Sunday.

That came a day after Manchester City had swept aside Aston Villa with a three-goal haul without response in the second half.

Chelsea and Manchester United both picked up impressive away wins and Brighton beat Everton at home, but the really noteworthy result came on Friday night, as Leicester walloped Southampton 9-0 at St. Mary’s.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Elsewhere, Watford picked up a point but remain rooted to the foot of the table and Crystal Palace earned a 2-2 draw at Arsenal after being two goals down, among four draws in the top flight this weekend.

Below you can see which players impressed enough to make our team of the week.
